artifacts.summary: Analysis of novel temporal saturation approach via incremental family construction - concluded NOT VIABLE due to total function structure and omega-rule limitation

findings.reason: IndexedMCSFamily uses total function mcs : D -> Set Formula, preventing incremental extension. The omega-rule limitation is inferential, not structural.
key_insights: Total function structure means every time already has an MCS - cannot 'add' times
Partial function alternative fails because coherence conditions become ill-defined
Modal saturation works by adding families to a FINITE bundle; temporal has INFINITE times
The gap is in the inference rule (omega-rule), not in the family representation
Forward-only truth lemma is mathematically correct and sufficient for completeness
findings.recommendation: Accept forward-only truth lemma, document omega-rule limitation, proceed with archival restructuring
